name: Antipattern detected
description: A flaw has been found in the Software System.

name: Antipattern’s properties are determined
description: The defect found in the Software System is localized, described and analyzed.

name: Antipattern influence determined
description: The influence of the antipattern was assessed and a decision was made on the advisability of its elimination.

name: Antipattern eliminated
description: The defect found in the Software System has been completely eliminated, all related work has been successfully completed.

name: Goals and Constraints Defined
description: The first things to consider in the architecture description are the architecture goals and constraints. Goals and constraints are often described at a fairly high level and may have a large scope. However goals and constrains are essential and will drive the rest of the architectural development work.

name: Significant Scenarios Described
description: Architectural requirements are not clear until architecturally significant scenarios are defined. These scenarios are needed to provide the basis for architectural prototyping and testing.

name: Views Described
description: The architectural views are described to ensure that the architecture addresses the concerns and meets the needs of the stakeholders.
